---
title: "Summarize pipeline results"
format: 
  html:
    embed-resources: true
editor: source
---


```{r}
library(targets)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```


Plot with results for each model

```{r}
tar_load(tune_results)
autoplot(tune_results)
```


Only the best results from each type of model

```{r}
autoplot(tune_results, select_best=TRUE)
```

Model ranking

```{r}
tar_load(ranked_results)
rmarkdown::paged_table(ranked_results)
```

Best model test-set performance

```{r}
tar_load(best_final_fit)
best_final_fit %>%
  collect_metrics()
```
